item.description:
Wonderbowl hosts a Trivia Buff night every Sunday starting at 8:30. Meet in Striker's Pub (inside the bowling alley) area at 8:15.
This is run just like the trivia night at Bayside in Fairhaven. Trivia Buff includes 4 "semesters," each with 4 questions that you allocate a number of points to. There is also a 'name-that-tune' portion as well as additional bonus questions. Categories range from movies to sports to science.
There can be up to 6 people on a team. Depending on how many people show up we will make multiple teams.
Striker's Pub has a full bar and reasonable drink prices. I am not sure if there will be food; I think that the kitchen is closed by that hour.

I will send out my cell phone number the day of the event, just in case. Hope to see you there!!
item.how_to_find_us: look for the group in Striker's Pub

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Trivia at Wonderbowl (in Striker's Pub)
